title: The Enchanted Paintbrush feat. Phillipa Soo
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Phillipa Soo (Hamilton, The Code) and Stacy Keach (Man With a Plan, American Greed) headline this Chinese tale about a kind, humble artist whose paintings come to life.
